author: dbids
content: I apologize if this is a stupid question, or the wrong place to ask it, but can you help me understand the pessimism implied by this market: https://polymarket.com/market/will-eip-1559-be-implemented-on-the-ethereum-mainnet-before-august-5-2021 ? All news articles I’ve read seem to say that things are going ahead as scheduled. I must be missing something obvious, I’d love to know what it is.

author: dbids
content: To be clear, I’m not recommending anyone participate in this platform or this market, I’m trying to understand for myself, as I’m really excited about Ethereum, but seem like I must be ignorant to some credible news source.

author: 0xmiddy
content:
Seems like everyone even semi-close to the project is confident in the ~August 4th date.
Maybe a bunch of people voting that haven't been following, but have heard of delays happening before, so they assume they'll happen here.

author: etaipo
content: Hi all

author: etaipo
content: I've got something truly offtopic that I hope you can help me out with

author: etaipo
content: I'd like to help gamestop shareholders understand core concepts of cryptocurrency

author: etaipo
content: this is because gamestop is working on an NFT platform over ethereum

author: etaipo
content: I'm not an expert by any means but I feel I have a decent understanding of it all, but explaining it to someone who doesn't really know much about crypto seems difficult

author: etaipo
content: are there any good learning resources that I could share with them to help them out?

author: etaipo
content: thanks in advance

author: etaipo
content: I may just share this link with them instead: https://youtu.be/O1JqruIrdmQ

author: etaipo
content: It's a bit more NFT art focused, but it seems solid for crypto fundamentals
